## GRPC class

A client for interacting with the Cerbos policy decision point server over gRPC.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare class GRPC extends Client 
```
**Extends:** [Client](./core.client.md)

## Remarks

Not supported in browsers.

See [the parent class](./core.client.md) for available methods.

## Constructors

|  Constructor | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [(constructor)(target, options)](./grpc.grpc._constructor_.md) |  | Create a client for interacting with the Cerbos policy decision point (PDP) server over gRPC. |

## Methods

|  Method | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [close()](./grpc.grpc.close.md) |  | Disconnect from the Cerbos policy decision point server and clean up resources. |
